title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the reason James Harden was traded from the Nets to the 76ers and why Kevin Durant is incredibly talented but lacks the leadership necessary to be an all time great. He has some bad news for one of the most popular teams in the NFL and a Super Bowl favorite next season. He also points out the main reason why the Lakers have struggled this season. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to tell Colin why the Bengals won't contend for another Super Bowl in the near future.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
